string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Who is known as father of Java Programming?#James Gosling#M. P Java#Charel Babbage#Blais Pascal
In java control statements break, continue and assert belongs to?#Selection statements#Loop Statements#Transfer Statements#Pause Statements
Which provides runtime environment for java byte code to be executed?#JDK#JVM#JRE#JAVAC
which of the following is not Java keyword?#double#switch#then#instanceof
Which of these have highest precedence?#()#++#*#>>
Data type long literals are appended by#Uppercase L#Lowercase L#Long#BothA and B
Java language was initially called as#Sumatra#Java#Oak#Pine
Which one is a templet for creating different objects?#An Array#A class#Interface#Method
Which of these operators is used to allocate memory to array variable in Java?#alloc#malloc#new malloc#new
Which symbol is used to contain values of automatically initialized arrays?#Brackets#Braces#Parenthese#Comma
